# Rogue's Agility
## Overview
*Rogueâ€™s Agility (Ex):* Any dodge bonus to your armor class may be applied to your [[Acrobatics (Skill)|Acrobatics]], [[Climb (Skill)|Climb]], [[Escape Artist (Skill)|Escape Artist]], and [[Swim (Skill)|Swim]] skill checks. 

**Source:** Class Acts: Rogues (Abandoned Arts), pg. 3
